It's that weird on the original too (I havent tried this one yet but i know that the FM 07 Editor is weird). try to update and then you will have the newest editor and files but it will say that you have an earlier version with the crack.(Before you update FM 07 put in the original game files for FM 07, and move or rename the crack for now and after the update yust put in the crack again and voila you have an updated game.)
